page.title: 05LIFE IN ELM PARK 1985
page.content:
My name is John. I live in a 3-bedroomed house with my mum, dad and sister. My bedroom is a boxroom - it is big for a boxroom. I have a remote control car. (JW) My name is John. I live with my mumm, dad and sister. Our house has 3 bedrooms. I have an Amstrad Computer. (JF) My name is Paul. I have 2 brothers. On Friday night I go to a club. (PT) My name is Darren. I live in a 3-bedroomed house. I have one sister. My dad is a postman. My mum works in a school as a Welfare Assistant. (DD) My name is Richard. I have one brother and one sister. My dad works at the Bank of England. I have a Computer and an organ. We have 2 dogs. (RB)
AYLOFF SCHOOL.
